Headline: No trains between Polk and the Loop
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Polk and the Loop due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Polk and the Loop due to track conditions.
As a result, trains are operating between 54th/Cermak and Polk only. 
Passengers may use #20 Madison buses as an alternative to Pink Line service.
Shuttle buses will be available to provide connecting service through the affected area.
See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.
We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Harlem and Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem and Clark/Lake due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem and Clark/Lake due to track conditions.

As a result, trains are operating only between 63rd and Clark/Lake at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Harlem and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Passengers may use the #20 Madison bus as an alternative. 

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 79th/Normal
ShortDescription: Eastbound 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes, and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes, and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Normal.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
